remarks: Orthogonality (meaning inner product is 0) is commutative.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ipcl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ipcl.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
diporthcom $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A P B ) = 0 <-> ( B P A ) = 0 ) ) $.
